complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup Rust project foundation with Axum
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Standard project initialization with well-documented dependencies. Straightforward setup with minimal technical challenges.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Design database schema with relationships, 2) Create migration files with proper constraints, 3) Setup migration runner and validation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity due to schema design decisions, foreign key relationships, and migration management. Critical foundation component.
Standard Redis integration with connection pooling. Well-established patterns with good library support.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create core application structure and routing
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Setup application state and dependency injection, 2) Create router structure with versioning, 3) Implement middleware stack, 4) Add graceful shutdown handling
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium-high complexity as it establishes core architecture patterns. Multiple components need to work together correctly.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) JWT token generation and validation, 2) Password hashing and verification, 3) Authentication middleware, 4) Login/logout endpoints, 5) Refresh token rotation mechanism
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to security requirements, token management, and multiple authentication flows. Critical for application security.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Implement sliding window algorithm with Redis, 2) Create rate limiting middleware with different limits, 3) Add proper HTTP headers and error responses
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderately high complexity due to algorithm implementation and Redis integration. Requires careful testing of edge cases.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) User registration with validation, 2) User profile retrieval, 3) Profile update functionality, 4) User preferences management
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity with standard CRUD operations, validation logic, and security considerations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Team CRUD operations, 2) Role-based authorization system, 3) Member management, 4) Invite link generation, 5) Team settings management, 6) Permission validation middleware
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to role-based access control, invite system, and complex authorization logic. Multiple interacting components.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Task CRUD operations, 2) Advanced filtering and search, 3) Soft delete implementation, 4) Task assignment validation, 5) Status management and transitions
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to comprehensive filtering, soft delete logic, and business rule validation. Core feature with many edge cases.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) OAuth2 flow implementation with PKCE, 2) Google provider integration, 3) GitHub provider integration, 4) Account linking logic, 5) Secure token storage
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to OAuth2 protocol implementation, multiple providers, and secure token handling. External API dependencies.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) WebSocket connection management, 2) Authentication for WebSocket connections, 3) Redis pub/sub integration, 4) Message broadcasting system, 5) Connection cleanup and error handling, 6) Reconnection logic
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity due to real-time communication, connection management, and distributed messaging. Requires careful handling of edge cases.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) SMTP configuration and email templates, 2) Mention detection system, 3) Due date reminder scheduling, 4) User preference filtering
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderately high complexity due to template management, scheduling, and text parsing for mentions. External service dependencies.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) FCM integration and configuration, 2) Device token management, 3) Notification payload creation, 4) Token refresh and cleanup
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to Firebase integration, token lifecycle management, and mobile platform considerations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) React project setup with TypeScript and Tailwind, 2) Authentication context and protected routing, 3) Theme system and API client configuration
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity for frontend foundation setup. Standard React patterns with some configuration complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Drag-and-drop implementation, 2) Kanban board layout and columns, 3) Task card components, 4) WebSocket integration for real-time updates, 5) Task creation and editing modals
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to drag-and-drop interactions, real-time updates, and complex UI state management.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Team dashboard layout, 2) Member management interface, 3) Invite system UI, 4) Activity feed component
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderately high complexity due to role-based UI, invite flows, and real-time activity updates.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Prometheus metrics implementation, 2) Structured logging setup, 3) Health check endpoints, 4) Custom application metrics
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity with standard observability patterns. Important for production readiness but well-documented approaches.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Data export functionality, 2) Account deletion with cascading, 3) Data anonymization, 4) Audit logging system
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to legal compliance requirements, data handling across multiple systems, and audit trail implementation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Multi-stage Dockerfile creation, 2) Docker Compose for local development, 3) Kubernetes manifests and configuration, 4) Auto-scaling and resource management
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderately high complexity due to containerization best practices, Kubernetes configuration, and auto-scaling setup.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Database query optimization and indexing, 2) Connection pool tuning, 3) Response caching implementation, 4) WebSocket optimization, 5) Load testing setup, 6) Performance profiling and bottleneck analysis
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity requiring deep system understanding, performance analysis skills, and comprehensive testing. Critical for production readiness.
